message: My favorite Nikkor lens is my 70-200 VRII f2.8. The image stabilization built into this lens is nothing short of amazing. I have shot in low light at 1/80th of a second at 200mm hand-held without any issues: http://www.flickr.com/photos/areaguides/4534192211 in a pinch I've shot all the way down to 1/30th hand-held. I almost always shoot wide open at f2.8 and even in fast moving sports the auto focus is fast and spot on: http://www.flickr.com/photos/areaguides/4860540600 Do not pass go buy this lens!
